title: A triumphant Trump today but troubles ahead. Happy new year?
shortDescription: As the president addresses the nation, unemployment is edging up, his job approval is edging down. And the midterms? Don't ask.

title: Trump to announce 'aggressive' housing reform
shortDescription: President Trump said in his national address that he will announce the "most aggressive" housing reform plans in 2026.

title: Trump announces $1,776 'warrior dividend'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced that his administration is giving out $1,776 “warrior dividend” checks to military service members before Christmas.

title: Trump’s ballroom project can proceed for now, judge rules
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Richard Leon denied the National Trust’s bid for a temporary restraining order, saying it failed to show “irreparable harm" now.

title: See the new White House 'Presidential Walk of Fame' plaques
shortDescription: Newly installed plaques summarizing the legacies of former US Presidents, as interpreted by the Trump White House, have been installed at the White House.

title: Trump salutes fallen troops at Dover
shortDescription: President Donald Trump saluted fallen Iowa National Guard soldiers at Dover Air Force Base.

title: Trump attends Dover ceremony for fallen Iowa National Guard soldiers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump attends a dignified transfer of the remains of two slain Iowa National Guard members and a civilian interpreter at Dover Air Force Base on Dec. 17, 2025.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? See polls as he gives year-end address
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is giving a White House address. His speech is expected to cover his near-year in office. What do the polls say about him?

title: En medio del conflicto con Venezuela, Trump declara al fentanilo 'arma de destrucción masiva'
shortDescription: Trump justifica sanciones y ataques contra Venezuela por narcotráfico, pero datos oficiales revelan que el fentanilo que mata en EE. UU. no proviene del país.

title: Trump attends transfer of 2 National Guard troops killed in Syria
shortDescription: Trump traveled to Delaware to attend the dignified transfer of two National Guard troops who were killed in Syria by an Islamic State gunman.

title: Troops get pay raise with defense bill passage. What else is in there?
shortDescription: Congress just passed its $900 billion annual defense policy bill, sending it to President Trump's desk for a signature.

title: FCC chair grilled on Kimmel, Trump's comments on Reiner
shortDescription: FCC Chair Brendan Carr appeared before a Senate oversight committee on Dec. 17.

title: Trump swipes presidential foes in plaques attached to White House
shortDescription: President Trump took personal swipes at his top presidential foes in new plaques installed along the White House's "Presidential Walk of Fame."

title: Trump prosecutor Jack Smith defends probes in House testimony
shortDescription: Republican chair of the House Judiciary Committee, Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio, subpoenaed Smith for a closed-door deposition.

title: Trump alleges Ilhan Omar 'hates Jewish people' at Hanukkah event
shortDescription: Trump has repeatedly targeted Rep. Ilhan Omar, who is Muslim, since his first term as president.

title: Watch Melania Trump's movie trailer on the days ahead of inauguration
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump's documentary chronicles her transition into her role before inauguration. The first look at the film is out now, watch.

title: Karoline Leavitt: The face of White House press briefings
shortDescription: See Karoline Leavitt in her role as White House press secretary during the second Trump administration.

title: Trump says estimated White House ballroom cost doubled to $400 million
shortDescription: Trump said the projected cost of his White House ballroom has risen to $400 million, double the initial estimate in July of $200 million.

title: 'Doesn't get worse': Trump slams Brown after shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump took to Truth Social to criticize the number of security cameras at Brown University.

title: Trump expands US travel ban list
shortDescription: President Donald Trump extended the U.S. travel ban to 39 countries citing security and foreign policy concerns.

title: Watch livestream: Trump set to address the nation from White House
shortDescription: President Trump is set to deliver a live address from the White House on the evening of Wednesday, Dec. 17.

title: Mamdani's NYC win has Staten Island Republicans talking secession
shortDescription: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani isn't even in office yet, but many Staten Island lawmakers are concerned and thinking about seceding from NYC

title: Trump praises 'enduring resilience' of Jewish people at Hanukkah event
shortDescription: The president hosted Jewish American supporters at a White House event where he touted his support for Israel and lamented recent antisemitic attacks.
